tool_description: It is a  RESTful API intended to generate unique and verifiable tokens (cryptographic id codes). Use this tokens as an URL parameter in your marketing or customer service campaigns to validate requests that occurs in a timely period previously defined by your system
name: token2go
title: token2go

api_list.name: Read a Link or Token by its id
api_list.description: Read a link or token by its id. It is used to see the content (t=link or t=token), but cannot validate the signature.

api_list.name: Validate a token
api_list.description: Submit a token (t=token) or a link (t=link) id in order to check if  it is a valid one. To be a valid token it must have a valid signature and not expired.
